{"id":650331424,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1646021406,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"148 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/650331424/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Characters to Make Fancy String","memory":"42.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeFancyString(string s) {\n        if(s.size()<=2){\n            return s;\n        }\n        vector<char> v;\n        for(int i=0;i<2;i++){\n            v.emplace_back(s[i]);\n        }\n        for(int i=2;i<s.size();i++){\n            int m = v.size();\n            if(v[m-2]==v[m-1] && v[m-1]==s[i]){\n                continue;\n            }\n            v.emplace_back(s[i]);\n        }\n        string ans(v.begin(),v.end());\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-characters-to-make-fancy-string"}
